EmailTemplate.description: Confirmation and training instructions for regular Business Users
EmailTemplate.name: Seismic Business User Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Case# {!Case.CaseNumber} - Seismic Business User Access Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Support_Requester__c},
You have been granted access to our content management tool Seismic, which can be found at https://officedepot.seismic.com. Upon initial login, you may be prompted for a one-time email validation and will then proceed to the site.
After login, please take some time to browse the User Training section located on the Getting Started with Seismic article page. This may be found as a tile in the DocCenter landing page.
There is no need to reply to this email and you may proceed with accessing Seismic, as described above.
For all questions, issues or feedback, please feel free to send an email to seismic@officedepot.com.
Best Regards, Seismic Support Team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
